QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, case when lower(metastasis_dx_date_type) = 'exact' then to_date(metastasis_dx_date, 'YYYYMMDD') when left(metastasis_dx_date, 4) != 'yyyy' and right(metastasis_dx_date, 4) = 'mmdd' and DATE_PART(year, note_date) = left(metastasis_dx_date, 4) then note_date when left(metastasis_dx_date, 4) != 'yyyy' and right(metastasis_dx_date, 4) = 'mmdd' then to_date(replace(metastasis_dx_date, 'mmdd', '0630'), 'YYYYMMDD') when left(metastasis_dx_date, 4) != 'yyyy' and right(metastasis_dx_date, 2) = 'dd' and DATE_PART(year, note_date) || DATE_PART(month, note_date) = left(metastasis_dx_date, 6) then note_date when left(metastasis_dx_date, 4) != 'yyyy' and right(metastasis_dx_date, 2) = 'dd' then to_date(replace(metastasis_dx_date, 'dd', '15'), 'YYYYMMDD') else note_date end as date, 'Metastasis to ' || metastasis_location as source_value, case when lower(mets_qualifier) = 'actual' then 4181412 when lower(mets_qualifier) = 'absent' then 4132135 else 0 end as value_as_concept_id, mets_qualifier as value_source_value, neoplasm_histology_key, 1147127 as meas_event_field_concept_id FROM {sc}.onc_metastatic_location l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where lower(mets_temporal_status) = 'current' order by 1
